text:
As many as 15 persons sustained injuries, some of them seriously, when the van picking up workers for a garments company overturned near here on Thursday.

The van started from Sathanur and was picking up workers for morning shift along the way. When it was going through Athiyanthal village in Chengam Road it overturned injuring all the 15 persons in the van. According to eye witnesses the van was over speeding when the driver applied brake and lost control. The vehicle veered away from the highway and overturned. All the injured, including 12 women, were rushed to the Government Tiruvannamalai Medical College Hospital with the help of 108-ambulances. A case has been booked. — Staff Reporter
title: 15 workers injured as van overturns
